title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.21 - Prohibited activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.21 - Prohibited activities

State Regulations

No person, firm, partnership, corporation, association or
other entity, including any of the signatory parties, any political
subdivision, agency, department or instrumentality of any of them, shall cause
or permit any pollution of ground waters or violate the ground water quality
objectives or control requirements imposed by or determined pursuant to this
section or Part 860 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
861.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
